title: Power outage in Taiwan affects main iPhone chipmaker TSMC factory
content:
Taiwan was hit by widespread power outages this Thursday. With that, two of its biggest cities, TMSC’s iPhone processor production hub, and over five million households were affected by this issue.

more…

The post Power outage in Taiwan affects main iPhone chipmaker TSMC factory appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Taiwan was hit by widespread power outages affecting two of its biggest cities and TMSC's iPhone processor production hub.
